en_raw: So let's talk about Craft skills.
en_clean: So let's talk about Craft skills.

en_raw: Compared to normal attacks, Craft skills are more powerful, or may allow us to heal, or buff ourselves up.
en_clean: Compared to normal attacks, Craft skills are more powerful, or may allow us to heal, or buff ourselves up.

en_raw: Enemies won't be shy about using Craft skills, so we shouldn't either.
en_clean: Enemies won't be shy about using Craft skills, so we shouldn't either.

en_raw: But using one Craft skill means it'll go into Cooldown. After using one, we won't be able to execute the same skill for a few turns.
en_clean: But using one Craft skill means it'll go into Cooldown. After using one, we won't be able to execute the same skill for a few turns.

en_clean: I-it's usually fine, but it might be dangerous with healing skills!

jp_clean: そ、それで大丈夫なときもあるけど、回復スキルの場合は困っちゃうこともあるよね！

en_clean: I'll try to make sure to use my healing skills carefully, so I don't run out at a dangerous moment...

en_clean: But even if it happens, there's items to recharge our cooled down skills, and there might even be skills and equipment out there to help out!
